thread.title: Speeding Comet streaks to victory in Belmont feature
thread.title_full: Speeding Comet streaks to victory in Belmont feature

title: Speeding Comet streaks to victory in Belmont feature
text:
Speeding Comet streaks to victory in Belmont feature THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   5:31   5:31   
Subjects: 
New York (1742) 
NEW YORK â€” Speeding Comet streaked past Indian Brut to win the $77,000 allowance feature on the turf Sunday at Belmont Park. 
A 4-year-old trained by John Toscano, Speeding Comet surged in deep stretch for a one-length victory, his fourth in 13 starts. 
Irad Ortiz, Jr. was aboard for the seven furlongs in 1:22.80 on the firm course. 
Speeding Comet paid $9, $4.10 and $2.90. 
Indian Brut returned $7.80 and $5.90 while No Wunder paid $10 to show.
